description: The purpose of this skill is to be a quick and easy way to be reminded how to spell words. It is much easier than trying to go online and type out how you think the word should be spelled and hoping that your word will come up.
exampleInteractions: Alexa Ask quick word spell to spell toaster
Alexa Ask quick word spell to spell pineapple
name: Quick word spell
shortDescription: This skill helps users spell words that they know how to say but forget to spell.
